column4: I've got a DELL Vostro 1000 that won't boot.  Googling brings me old stuff (2007-ish)  I'm on Lucid and at an initramfs prompt
where does the boot process fail?
erUSUL nothing seems to mount.  /dev, /sys, /proc  no such file or directory in any of those cases.  Target filesystem doesn't have /sbin/init  No init found.  ry passing init=bootarg
